text: Ahmed Boukous (Amazigh: ⵃⵎⴰⴷ ⴱⵓⴽⵓⵙ, Ḥmad bukus; born October, 15, 1946) is a Moroccan Amazighist, linguist and sociologist. He is now the president of the Royal Institute of the Amazigh Culture. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:Moroccan scientists Category:Linguists Category:Sociologists Category:Moroccan writers
title: Ahmed Boukouss
